post.text: A rally fit for a King. hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: Marisa
comment.text: Couldn't fill a 10,000 seat arena couldja Hillary?

replies.author: Mason
replies.text: Couldn't even fill 25% of the stadium even with LeBron there. Sad. Shows how low you are and what people really think of you hillary.

replies.author: Marisa
replies.text: Literally the crowd behind her in the photos, plus maybe another 500 on the floor. The dark curtains on the sides cover the empty seats and the camera angles never show the floor.
